title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Khrinivka, Hirsk, Mkhy, Tymonovychi, Kostobobriv, Mykhalc...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Khrinivka, Hirsk, Mkhy, Tymonovychi, Kostobobriv, Mykhalchyna Sloboda of Chernihiv region, Kucherivka, Starykove, Kindrativka, Veselivka, Basivka of Sumy region, Veterynarne, Borysivka, Ambarne, Strilecha of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Kharkiv region and Kharkiv city, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
